references.paper_title: VoxelNet: End-to-End Learning for Point Cloud Based 3D Object Detection
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many 3D object detection methods using point clouds, which are important to the task of offboard perception.
SECOND is a highly cited and influential method for 3D object detection using sparse convolutions, improving efficiency and accuracy.

references.paper_title: PointPillars: Fast Encoders for Object Detection from Point Clouds
references.reason: PointPillars introduced an efficient architecture for processing point cloud data that is widely used in autonomous driving perception.

references.paper_title: PointRCNN: 3D Object Proposal Generation and Detection from Point Cloud
references.reason: This method uses a two-stage approach that generates 3D object proposals and refines them, improving accuracy over single-stage methods.
This paper presents a center-based approach to 3D object detection and tracking, a significant improvement over previous methods, and is highly relevant to the task of offboard perception.
